text: Erick López Barriga (born 14 May 1971) is a Mexican politician from the Party of the Democratic Revolution. From 2006 to 2009, he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Michoacán. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Morelia Category:Politicians from Michoacán Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Party of the Democratic Revolution politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Erick López Barriga
